testcase.classname: Order the Product from Flipkart Website
testcase.name: To order a any product from the list of samsung mobile
testcase.system-out: Given Launch the URL........................................................passed Then Validate the URL.......................................................passed When Do a Product search....................................................passed And Select any product & Add that to the cart...............................passed Then Check the right product is added with respective prices................passed When Place Order & Login to the application by using "7200178755" and "endurance".passed And Select Address & Select Payment option..................................passed When Remove the product from the cart.......................................passed Then Check the Product is removed from the cart.............................passed
